mapper.select: select * from products inner join stock on products.item_num = stock.item_num where supplier is not null and products.item_type like '%식자재'

select sto_num, ifnull(store.sto_progress,'미입고') as sto_progress, placeorder.order_qty, products.item_name, stock.stk_qnt from store right Outer join placeorder on placeorder.order_num = store.order_num left outer join products on placeorder.item_num = products.item_num left join stock on products.item_num = stock.item_num
